txt.en: Defeat the powerful bog-lurker known as Hâzlur wandering Dil-irmíz.
Return to Bôgalekh in Jadambor in Dil-irmíz to inform them of Hâzlur's defeat.
'I hear reports from my scouts that you have accomplished the task of felling Hâzlur.\n\n'We thank you [placeholder]. That foul beast was a menace that we could not suffer any longer.'
Bôgalekh has asked you to defeat Hâzlur, a powerful bog-lurker spotted in the area.

'Good tidings, [placeholder].

'A dangerous bog-lurker by the name of Hâzlur has been spotted wandering Dil-irmíz as of late and I have heard reports from our scouts of the destruction it has been causing.

'We can not let the beast continue to cause harm to the people down here. If you can, gather some allies and deal with this threat.'
I hear reports from my scouts that you have accomplished the task
Return to Bôgalekh to inform them of Hâzlur's defeat
